TopicTitle: Wrote a bot that notifies mod updates via Twitter

Articles.Content: Pretty much what the title says. It's broadcasting its findings via @MuffinWatcher to #KSPModUpdated. The bot checks for updates every 15 minutes. It uses CKAN internally so it'll only see updates for CKAN-enabled mods.

Loving this.  It saves me from reading through the entire CKAN list every day.

Do you think it could link to the CKAN-listed homepage for the mod? If you need to save characters, the format could be:

ModName #KSPModUpdated for 1.X.X bit.ly/link

Edited May 10, 2016 by curiousepic

On 5/10/2016 at 9:32 AM, curiousepic said:

Do you think it could link to the CKAN-listed homepage for the mod? If you need to save characters, the format could be:

Done. Except I used j.mp instead of bit.ly. I'll shorten the message further if needed.
Got a bit "spammy" since 1.1.3 came out, repetitive tweets over and over.............
